text.div:
Id: ANCDT32
Url: ANC.DT.32 Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccination
Version: 0.3.0
Official

ANC.DT.32

Title: ANC.DT.32 Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccination
Type:

system: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/plan-definition-type

code: eca-rule

Date: 2025-06-24 13:58:48-0600
Publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)
Description:

If the woman has not yet been fully immunized against tetanus, she should be immunized
Use Context:
code value
task
Jurisdiction: 001
Libraries:
ANC.DT.32 Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccination
Actions:
ANC.DT.32 Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccination:
When: Named Event: ANC.B10.7. Immunizations
Then:
Tetanus toxoid (TT) vaccination is recommended for all pregnant women who are not fully immunised against TT to prevent neonatal mortality from tetanus
If: Applicability: (("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization history" = "Under-immunized") OR ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization history" = "No doses")) OR ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization history" = "Unknown") (Should Provide tetanus toxoid immunizations – using the \"Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization – NO PREVIOUS\" schedule (3 dose scheme))
1–4 doses of TTCV in the past: – 1 dose scheme: Woman should receive one dose of TTCV during each subsequent pregnancy to a total of five doses (five doses protects throughout the childbearing years)
If: Applicability: (((("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 1 immunization provided" = TRUE) AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 2 immunization provided" = TRUE) AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 3 immunization provided" = TRUE) AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 4 immunization provided" = TRUE)) OR (("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 1 immunization provided" = TRUE) AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 2 immunization provided" = TRUE) AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 3 immunization provided" = TRUE))) OR (("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 1 immunization provided" = TRUE) AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 2 immunization provided" = TRUE))) OR ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 1 immunization provided" = TRUE) (Should Provide tetanus toxoid immunizations – using the \"Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization – WITH PREVIOUS\" schedule (1 dose scheme))

name: ANCDT32
title: ANC.DT.32 Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccination
description: If the woman has not yet been fully immunized against tetanus, she should be immunized

action.title: Provide tetanus toxoid immunizations – using the "Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)
action.description: Provide tetanus toxoid immunizations – using the "Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)
action.textEquivalent: Tetanus toxoid (TT) vaccination is recommended for all pregnant women who are not fully immunised against TT to prevent neonatal mortality from tetanus

documentation.label:
WHO ANC recommendations (2016): C.5. Tetanus toxoid vaccination (3)

Maternal immunization against tetanus (IMPAC) (2006) (11)

expression.description:
(("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization history" = "Under-immunized")
  OR ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization history" = "No doses"))
  OR ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization history" = "Unknown")
expression.expression: Should Provide tetanus toxoid immunizations – using the \"Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization – NO PREVIOUS\" schedule (3 dose scheme)

action.title: Provide tetanus toxoid immunizations – using the "Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization – WITH PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)
action.description: Provide tetanus toxoid immunizations – using the "Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization – WITH PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)
action.textEquivalent:
1–4 doses of TTCV in the past:
– 1 dose scheme: Woman should receive one dose of TTCV during each subsequent pregnancy to a total of five doses (five doses protects throughout the childbearing years)

documentation.label:
WHO ANC recommendations (2016): C.5. Tetanus toxoid vaccination (3)

Maternal immunization against tetanus (IMPAC) (2006) (11)

expression.description:
(((("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 1 immunization provided" = TRUE)
  AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 2 immunization provided" = TRUE)
  AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 3 immunization provided" = TRUE)
  AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 4 immunization provided" =  TRUE))
  OR (("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 1 immunization provided" = TRUE)
  AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 2 immunization provided" = TRUE)
  AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 3 immunization provided" = TRUE)))
  OR (("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 1 immunization provided" = TRUE)
  AND ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 2 immunization provided" = TRUE)))
  OR ("Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) 1 immunization provided" = TRUE)
expression.expression: Should Provide tetanus toxoid immunizations – using the \"Tetanus toxoid-containing vaccine (TTCV) immunization – WITH PREVIOUS\" schedule (1 dose scheme)
